entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
